u_shaped_ranking.core_sentence: As long-lived species with delayed maturity, changes in the productivity of marine birds are expected to
u_shaped_ranking.context_window: The assessment is based on how many chicks are fledged (having wing feathers that are large enough for flight) annually, per pair, clutch or nest. Breeding productivity is one of the demographic determinants of population growth rate.
